name: Introduction to Gender and Sexuality Studies
description: This course provides an introduction to the study of gender and sexuality in the larger field of cultural studies. It covers topics such as the construction of gender and sexuality, gender roles, gender-based violence, and LGBTQ+ identities. It also examines how gender and sexuality intersect with power, culture, and politics.

name: Gender Identity and Expression
description: This course explores the social, cultural, and psychological aspects of gender identity and expression. It covers topics such as gender norms, gender roles, gender-based discrimination, and gender identity and expression in a variety of contexts. It examines how gender identity and expression are shaped by social and cultural factors, as well as how they impact personal and professional lives.
prerequisites: Introduction to Gender and Sexuality Studies

name: Gender and Sexuality in Popular Culture
description: This course examines how gender and sexuality are represented in popular culture. It covers topics such as gender roles, gender stereotypes, gender-based violence, and LGBTQ+ representation in media. It examines how popular culture shapes gender and sexuality, as well as how it is shaped by gender and sexuality.
prerequisites: Introduction to Gender and Sexuality Studies

name: Gender and Sexuality in Literature
description: This course examines how gender and sexuality are represented in literature. It covers topics such as gender roles, gender stereotypes, gender-based violence, and LGBTQ+ representation in literature. It examines how literature shapes gender and sexuality, as well as how it is shaped by gender and sexuality.
prerequisites: Introduction to Gender and Sexuality Studies
Gender and Sexuality in Popular Culture
